price: Und seid nicht wie diejenigen, die sagen: Wir hören, wo sie doch nicht hören!
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
